name: Rent Payment Information
query:
SELECT 
    rp.name AS "Rent Payment ID:Link/Rent Payment",
    rp.lease_contract AS "Lease Contract:Link/Lease Contract",
    rp.payment_date AS "Payment Date:Date",
    rp.rent_amount AS "Rent Amount:Currency",
    rp.receipt_number AS "Receipt Number"
FROM 
    `tabRent Payment` rp
WHERE 
    rp.payment_date IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 
    rp.payment_date DESC;
